alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 16 at 4:00PM HST until January 17 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A moderate size west northwest swell will continue to produce advisory level surf along exposed north and west facing shores through early Monday. Surf is forecast to quickly fall to below advisory heights during the day Monday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Surf heights along north facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and Maui are expected to range from 18 to 22 feet tonight. Surf heights along west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu and Molokai are expected to range from 10 to 15 feet tonight. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai and for the north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
